task.title: Validate In-Mbox Profile Attributes
task.shortdesc: After you associate in-mbox profile attributes with an mbox, validate the parameters.

step.cmd: Mouse over Locations and click List.

stepresult.p: The parameters are listed beside your mbox. In-mbox profile parameters are at the bottom of the list.

step.cmd: If the parameters do not appear, browse to the page with your mbox and refresh the page.

stepresult.p: Return to the my mboxes list page and click refresh.

p.note: Parameters load automatically when the mboxed page is viewed in a browser. They can also be added dynamically using the Target interface.

stepresult.p: Tip: Use in-mbox profile parameters to target content or add segment filters to reports. Also, you may display profile values directly in an HTML offer and update in-mbox profile attributes via the HTML offer.
